titles.title: Armed Career Criminal Clarification Act
To amend title 18, United States Code, to make certain drug offenses under State law predicate offenses under the armed career criminal statute.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 7/13/1993--Introduced. Armed Career Criminal Clarification Act - Establishes as a predicate offense under the armed career criminal statute any offense under State law which would have been punishable by a maximum term of imprisonment of ten years or more because of the type and quantity of the controlled substance involved if the offense had been prosecuted as a violation of the Controlled Substances Act.
